name: Pegasus Runner by Trippie Redd
description:
Play as Trippie Redd in the new Pegasus Runner commemorating the release of the album "Pegasus". Navigate the crescent moon in pursuit of Diamonds and Gold. Stream your favorite songs, dodge evil skulls and bombs, collect love letters, and use pegasus wings to take flight.
Swipe across the screen (left and right) or up (to jump) to control Trippie's movement through the game.
Collect diamonds or purchase them with coins to continue the mission even after defeat.
Those who subscribe to our game membership are able to gain additional diamonds daily (game membership is an auto-renewable subscription).
